name: Scrapper_Melee.Claws
display_help: Claws are bones or blades that extend from your hands and cause Lethal damage. The lightweight, natural feel of claws gives this power set a reduced Endurance cost and faster attack rate than other Scrapper melee sets. Like all scrapper powers, all Claw attacks can sometimes land a critical hit for double damage.

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Claws.Swipe
powers.display_help: Two quick Swipes with your claws. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 18.77 lethal damage on target after 0.5s delay

10.00% chance for 47.55 lethal damage on target [CRITICAL]
Only against targets tougher than minion class

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Claws.Strike
powers.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your claws. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Claws.Slash
powers.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your claws, dealing a good amount of lethal damage, but with a longer recharge rate than Swipe or Strike . This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Claws.Taunt
powers.display_help: Challenges a foe to attack you. Useful to pull a villain off an ally who finds themselves in over their head. A To Hit check required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: -75.00% strength to range for 12s on target

powers.name: Scrapper_Melee.Claws.Focus
powers.display_help: Projects a burst of focused power over a short distance. Focus deals high damage and can possibly knock down your foe. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

powers.display_help: You spin and slash violently, Eviscerating all foes in a wide arc in front of you. This attack has an exceptionally good critical hit capability, better than other Claw attacks, that can sometimes deal double damage. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Moderate
